#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
#include<climits>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define sint(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define ss(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp(i,j) make_pair(i,j)
#define ll long long
#define MAX 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define vi vector<int>
#define vvi vector < vi >
#define pb(i) push_back(i);
#define tr(v,it) for(it=v.begin();it!=v.end();it++)
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    int i;
    int n;
    int q;
    cin>>n>>q;
    string s;
    cin>>s;

   int a[n+2];
   FOR(i,0,n+1)
   a[i]=0;
   int l,r,k;
    FOR(i,1,q)
    {
        cin>>l>>r>>k;
        a[l]+=k;
        a[r+1]-=k;
    }
    FOR(i,1,n)
    {
        a[i]=(a[i-1]+a[i])%26;
    }

    int len=s.length();
    FOR(i,0,len-1)
    {
        a[i+1]=a[i+1]%26;

        s[i]=s[i]-'a';
        s[i]=(s[i]+a[i+1]+26)%26;
        s[i]=s[i]+'a';
    }
    cout<<s<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
